title-group.article-title: Lease-Cost Measurement of Hospital Equipment under Cost-Based Reimbursement

abstract.p: This paper tests the contention that cost-based reimbursement makes lease financing more attractive than debt financing, applying a lease-cost measurement procedure incorporating cost-based reimbursement to a sample of lease contracts from not-for-profit hospitals. Four primary variables are varied to determine the sensitivity of the financing decision to these elements.
